title: Add About Me / Resume section
description: Create an about/resume section with bio, contact info, and professional background

title: Add Resource Graph Visualizer
description: Implement interactive knowledge graph visualization similar to dbt-agent kg-visualization.html for browsing all resources

title: Apply Lip Gloss TUI styling to main site
description: Integrate the ASCII border styling from index-lipgloss-test.html into the main index.html

title: Add dbt-agent project section
description: Create a section showcasing the dbt-agent environment with updates on AI agents, memory systems, semantic layers, and conversational BI journey. Link to https://github.com/keithbinkly/dbt-agent

title: Add category TOC navigation to topic pages
description: Add table of contents navigation for resource categories at top of middle column, above resources list. Consider tabbed pane or visual diagram showing category relationships.

title: Display infographics prominently with gallery
description: Add infographics between Context and Key Terms. Full-width main infographic with thumbnail gallery below for switching between available infographics. Click to enlarge to fullscreen.

title: Remove card legend from topic pages
description: Remove the card legend - navigation should be intuitive, not require instructions about hover vs long press.

title: Apply index-complete style to KB topic page
description: Create copy of kb-knowledge-engineering.html and restyle using the index-complete.html design system (ASCII borders, panel components, color scheme).

title: Full-width edge-to-edge layout
description: Make the TUI styled page utilize full screen width with adaptive edge-to-edge layout like the original style does.

title: Single-row resources with independent scroll
description: Resources list: don't stack text fields, put them across in single row per resource. Enable independent scroll for JUST the resource column with invisible scrollbar.

title: Increase text size per best practices
description: Text is too small - size up following typography best practices for readability.

title: Apply TUI style to resource cards
description: Apply new TUI style to resource cards from kb-knowledge-engineering-resource-card.html and enable popup cards on this page.

title: Category TOC with description pane
description: Transform category tabs into interactive pane showing one category description at a time. Hover over resource auto-switches to corresponding category tab and displays its summary.
